activities.head: President of Computer Engineering Class of 2019
Young Webmaster Camp 16th
text: Intensive web development camp. Pair of developers, marketers, designers and content creators are grouped together to create a product prototype in 4 days.
My team product, HugFood, aim to help eldery people serving their special recipe food in Bangkok
